# Solana Mobile Documentation

> Documentation for building mobile dApps on Solana using the Solana Mobile Stack

## Getting Started
- [Introduction](https://docs.solanamobile.com/getting-started/intro): Welcome to Solana Mobile - comprehensive guides for building Web3 mobile dApps
- [Development Setup](https://docs.solanamobile.com/developers/development-setup): Set up your Android development environment, device/emulator, and MWA wallet
- [Mobile dApp Architecture](https://docs.solanamobile.com/getting-started/mobile-dapp-architecture): Understand the architecture of mobile dApps on Solana

## Solana Mobile Stack
- [dApp Store Overview](https://docs.solanamobile.com/dapp-publishing/intro): The crypto-friendly app store for Solana Mobile devices
- [Mobile Wallet Adapter](https://docs.solanamobile.com/mobile-wallet-adapter/overview): Protocol for connecting dApps to mobile wallet apps for transaction signing
- [Seed Vault](https://docs.solanamobile.com/developers/seed-vault): Secure key custody system service for wallet apps

## React Native Development
- [Overview](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/overview): Guide for building React Native Android apps for Solana Mobile
- [Create a Project](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/quickstart): Initialize a new project with create-solana-dapp
- [Environment Setup](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/setup): Set up Expo for Android development
- [Making RPC Requests](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/making_rpc_requests): Use @solana/web3.js Connection class for Solana RPC requests
- [Building Transactions](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/building_transactions): Construct Solana transactions with web3.js
- [Mobile Wallet Adapter](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/using_mobile_wallet_adapter): Connect to wallets and request signing services
- [Caching Wallet Authorization](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/storing_mwa_auth): Store and reuse wallet authorization tokens
- [Anchor Integration](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/anchor_integration): Integrate Anchor programs in React Native
- [Metaplex Integration](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/metaplex_integration): Work with Metaplex NFT libraries
- [Build Your First dApp Tutorial](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/first_app_tutorial): Step-by-step tutorial for building your first Solana mobile dApp
- [Mobile NFT Minter Tutorial](https://docs.solanamobile.com/react-native/mobile_nft_minter_tutorial): Build an NFT photo minting app

## Kotlin Development
- [Overview](https://docs.solanamobile.com/android-native/overview): Guide for building native Kotlin Android apps for Solana
- [Project Setup](https://docs.solanamobile.com/android-native/setup): Configure your Android project with Solana Kotlin SDKs
- [Quickstart](https://docs.solanamobile.com/android-native/quickstart): Start with the Solana Jetpack Compose Scaffold
- [RPC Requests](https://docs.solanamobile.com/android-native/rpc-requests): Use rpc-core library for Solana RPC requests
- [Building Transactions](https://docs.solanamobile.com/android-native/building_transactions): Construct transactions with web3-core library
- [Mobile Wallet Adapter](https://docs.solanamobile.com/android-native/using_mobile_wallet_adapter): Connect to wallets in Kotlin apps
- [Sending SOL](https://docs.solanamobile.com/android-native/sending-sol): Sign and send a SOL transfer transaction
- [Working with Anchor](https://docs.solanamobile.com/android-native/using-anchor-programs): Interact with Anchor programs in Kotlin

## Community SDKs
- [Flutter](https://docs.solanamobile.com/flutter/overview): Third-party resources and SDKs for Flutter development
- [Unity](https://docs.solanamobile.com/unity/unity_sdk): Third-party resources and SDKs for Unity game development
- [Unreal Engine](https://docs.solanamobile.com/unreal/unreal_sdk): Third-party resources and SDKs for Unreal Engine development

## dApp Store Publishing
- [Publishing Checklist](https://docs.solanamobile.com/dapp-publishing/checklist): Requirements checklist before publishing
- [Submit a New App](https://docs.solanamobile.com/dapp-publishing/submit-new-app): Step-by-step guide to publish your app
- [Listing Page Guidelines](https://docs.solanamobile.com/dapp-publishing/listing-page-guidelines): Prepare your dApp listing page
- [Convert PWA to APK](https://docs.solanamobile.com/dapp-publishing/publishing-a-pwa): Convert a Progressive Web App to Android
- [Build Expo APK](https://docs.solanamobile.com/dapp-publishing/building-expo-apk): Create a release APK with Expo
- [Submit an Update](https://docs.solanamobile.com/dapp-publishing/submit-an-update): Update your published app
- [Publisher Policy](https://docs.solanamobile.com/dapp-publishing/publisher-policy): dApp Store publisher guidelines and policies
- [FAQ](https://docs.solanamobile.com/faq): Frequently asked questions about the dApp Store

## Mobile Wallet Adapter Details
- [Web Apps](https://docs.solanamobile.com/mobile-wallet-adapter/web-apps): MWA SDK for web applications
- [Web Installation](https://docs.solanamobile.com/mobile-wallet-adapter/web-installation): Install MWA for web projects
- [Migrating to Wallet Standard](https://docs.solanamobile.com/mobile-wallet-adapter/migrating-to-wallet-standard): Migration guide for wallet standard
- [UX Guidelines](https://docs.solanamobile.com/mobile-wallet-adapter/ux-guidelines): User experience best practices

## Reference
- [API Reference Overview](https://docs.solanamobile.com/reference/overview): API documentation for Solana Mobile Stack libraries
- [TypeScript MWA Reference](https://docs.solanamobile.com/reference/typescript/mobile-wallet-adapter): TypeScript Mobile Wallet Adapter API
- [Kotlin MWA Reference](https://docs.solanamobile.com/reference/kotlin/mobile-wallet-adapter): Kotlin Mobile Wallet Adapter API
- [web3.js Reference](https://docs.solanamobile.com/reference/typescript/web3js): Solana web3.js library reference

## Resources
- [Sample Apps](https://docs.solanamobile.com/sample-apps/sample_app_overview): Collection of reference sample applications
- [Community](https://docs.solanamobile.com/developers/community): Join the Solana Mobile developer community
- [AI Toolkit](https://docs.solanamobile.com/developers/ai-toolkit): AI-powered tools and LLM resources for development
